db:abstract.db:para: [missing-enum-entry] Enum value is missing from its declaration.

db:article.db:para: This warning category is spelled [missing-enum-entry] by qmllint.

db:section.db:title: Is not an entry of enum
What happened?
db:section.db:para: You used an enum value that does not exist.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: The enum value will be undefined at runtime.

db:section.db:title: Example
db:section.db:para: To fix this warning, correct a potential typo or add the missing enum value to the definition:
